mapper.sql: id, inpatientId, patientName, settlementId, billNo, transNo, itemId, itemCode, itemName, itemCount, itemPrice, itemAmount, feeDate, deptId, deptName, orderDocId, orderDocName, excuteDeptId, excuteDeptName, excuteDocId, excuteDocName, settlementDate, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, applyDateStr, orderNum, applyDataId, miCode, hisName, miName, dyyz, attendDocId, attendDocName, itemTypeCode, itemTypeName, feeOperatorId, feeOperatorName, feeDeptId, feeDeptName, areaType, isOutpfees, jzkh
mapper.select:
select * from yb_chs_jk where 1=1 and id =#{ ybChsJk.id} and inpatientId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.inpatientId} ,'%')
and patientName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.patientName} ,'%')
and settlementId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.settlementId} ,'%')
and billNo like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.billNo} ,'%')
and transNo like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.transNo} ,'%')
and itemId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.itemId} ,'%')
and itemCode like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.itemCode} ,'%')
and itemName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.itemName} ,'%')
AND ybChsJk.feeDate >= feeDateFrom}
AND ybChsJk.feeDate <= feeDateTo}
and deptId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.deptId} ,'%')
and deptName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.deptName} ,'%')
and orderDocId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.orderDocId} ,'%')
and orderDocName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.orderDocName} ,'%')
and excuteDeptId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.excuteDeptId} ,'%')
and excuteDeptName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.excuteDeptName} ,'%')
and excuteDocId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.excuteDocId} ,'%')
and excuteDocName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.excuteDocName} ,'%')
AND ybChsJk.settlementDate >= settlementDateFrom}
AND ybChsJk.settlementDate <= settlementDateTo}
and COMMENTS like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.comments} ,'%')
and STATE =#{ ybChsJk.state} and IS_DELETEMARK =#{ ybChsJk.isDeletemark} and applyDateStr = #{ ybChsJk.applyDateStr}
and orderNum =#{ ybChsJk.orderNum} and applyDataId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.applyDataId} ,'%')
and miCode like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.miCode} ,'%')
and hisName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.hisName} ,'%')
and miName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.miName} ,'%')
and dyyz =#{ ybChsJk.dyyz} and attendDocId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.attendDocId} ,'%')
and attendDocName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.attendDocName} ,'%')
and itemTypeCode like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.itemTypeCode} ,'%')
and itemTypeName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.itemTypeName} ,'%')
and feeOperatorId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.feeOperatorId} ,'%')
and feeOperatorName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.feeOperatorName} ,'%')
and feeDeptId like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.feeDeptId} ,'%')
and feeDeptName like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.feeDeptName} ,'%')
and areaType =#{ ybChsJk.areaType} and isOutpfees =#{ ybChsJk.isOutpfees} and jzkh like concat('%', #{ ybChsJk.jzkh} ,'%')
